attributes.action: For the Leicestershire Police Services acknowledge illegality of the marches
attributes.additional_details: To prevent future illegal marches and closure of main roads illegally
attributes.background: Marches that took place on Saturday 17th, and Sunday the 18th of September 2022, and pledge to uphold the law of the land. This should also extend to the closure of Belgrave Road consequent to India versus Pakistan cricket match on 28th August 2022

rejection.details: This is a matter for local police forces and the courts system, not the UK Government or Parliament.
